mapper.select: SELECT /* CartWriterMapper-selectCartList,작성일자 2021.11.11 by 고서희, 수정일자 YYYY.MM.DD by OOO */ SPBK_ID, SPBK_DVSN_CODE, SPBK_KIND_CODE, UNFY_CMDT_ID, UNT_ITM_SRMB ,MEMNO, TMPR_MMBR_NUM, REQU_QNTT, END_DTTM, MMBR_YS ,FRBE_YS, ORGL_UNFY_CMDT_ID, CYCL_CODE, DLVR_DW_CODE, TTL_DLVR_NMTM ,CNRC_NMTM, BRDR_BRAN_CODE, LINK_DVSN_CODE, JO_CODE, SCTN_CODE ,CHEK_YS, ADDT_ORDR_CNTT, PRIN_CNTT, CRTR_ID, CRET_DTTM ,AMNR_ID, AMND_DTTM FROM EOS.TM_SPBK LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0
